text: The 2014–15 Pepperdine Waves women's basketball team will represent Pepperdine University in the 2014–15 college basketball season. The Waves, members of the West Coast Conference, are led by second year coach Ryan Weisenberg. The Waves play their home games at the Firestone Fieldhouse on the university campus in Malibu, California. They finished the season 8–22, 3–15 in WCC play to finish in ninth place.
